segments.text: Those kids are stealing cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking everything on that tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar like it's his.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, reaching for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the mother doesn't even see the water flooding out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate as if nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, ruining the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible, all of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make it easy for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the whole disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should know better than to climb like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they'll make a huge crash when it falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, but this kitchen is a wreck.
segments.speaker: PAR
